content.0: Hello, my name is Guilherme Rodrigues de Morais, a 19-year-old from the interior of Goiás who has been passionate about programming since I was 15. Initially, I started creating Discord bots for fun, and due to the shortage of developers in Brazil, I was soon hired for specific projects. However, after about a year, I realized the work was complicated and not very profitable, so I decided to stop.
content.1: After a period of stagnation, I rediscovered my interest in front-end development and started working on learning projects in late 2023. Now, I'm seeking opportunities to reintegrate into the programming field and fulfill my dream of working for a company in this area.

projects.title: My projects
projects.sub-text: Here are some of the projects I ve created. If interested, see more at
projects.project-1: My first project, which wasn't done by following a tutorial or copying from somewhere else. Here was when I truly felt that I was learning.
projects.project-2: A small project where I recreated the famous snake game, where the objective is to move your snake to collect points and make it grow.

techs.title: Tools and Technologies
techs.sub-text: Explore some of the technologies I use in my projects. Each one has its function within a project, so if you feel curious, click on one to go to its website.
